channel.title: Aljazeera.com on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race
channel.description: Recent content in Aljazeera.com on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race

item.title: ‘Yellow line’, the de facto Israeli buffer zone shaping life in Gaza
item.description: The so-called yellow line has been squeezing Palestinians into smaller areas, making their lives more difficult.

item.title: Ferry carrying over 350 people sinks in Philippines, killing at least 15
item.description: The coastguard says at least 316 people have been rescued so far, while 28 others remain missing.

item.title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 1,432
item.description: These are the key developments from day 1,432 of Russia’s war on Ukraine.

item.title: Ukraine’s Zelenskyy says US security agreement ‘100% ready’ to be signed
item.description: Ukrainian leader says Kyiv and Moscow continue to have 'fundamentally different' positions on territorial concessions.

item.title: UN aid convoy reaches Syria’s Ain al-Arab as truce between army, SDF holds
item.description: Convoy carrying food and fuel reaches Kurdish-majority town, also known as Kobane, in Aleppo province.

item.title: Venezuela frees 104 political prisoners, rights group says
item.description: A human rights lawyer and a communications student are among those freed, Caracas-based Foro Penal says.

item.title: What role is China playing in global geopolitical transformations?
item.description: Chinese foreign policy is shaped by a paradox: it wants to project power and yet it seeks to avoid conflict.

item.title: ‘Invoking Insurrection Act would escalate conflict with private citizens’
item.description: ‘Invoking US Insurrection Act would escalate conflict with private citizens’

item.title: Arsenal vs Manchester United 2-3: Premier League – as it happened
item.description: All the updates as United shock Arsenal with stunning second-half goals from Patrick Dorgu and ⁠Matheus Cunha.

item.title: Bangladesh slams India over fugitive ex-PM Hasina’s first public address
item.description: Dhaka says it is 'shocked' the ousted leader was allowed to speak at news conference, her first since the 2024 uprising.

item.title: Cornel West: US is facing moral collapse and democratic decay
item.description: Academic and activist discusses what he sees as moral collapse in US and leadership crisis in the Democratic Party.

item.title: Envoys from US meet Netanyahu as Israel continues to bomb Gaza
item.description: Medical sources say at least three Palestinians have been killed and many wounded throughout the day in Israeli attacks.

item.title: Israel extends ban on Al Jazeera’s operations by 90 days
item.description: Since May 2024, Israeli law has banned the network, citing threat to national security, an allegation Al Jazeera denies.

item.title: Israel to reopen Gaza’s Rafah crossing after search for captive’s body ends
item.description: Netanyahu's office says Rafah crossing will reopen in a 'limited' manner after search for Israeli soldier's body ends.

item.title: Manchester United dent Arsenal’s title bid with dramatic 3-2 win
item.description: Matheus Cunha's superb late strike clinches a thrilling 3-2 away win for United against the Premier League leaders.

item.title: Minnesota Gov Walz demands Trump remove border agents after nurse killed
item.description: US president faces intensifying pressure over immigration crackdown following a second fatal shooting in Minneapolis.

item.title: Outrage after US agents kill ICU nurse Alex Pretti in Minnesota
item.description: Authorities say Alex Pretti posed a violent threat when shot by US ICE agents, but multiple videos suggest otherwise.

item.title: Pentagon downplays China threat: What it means for US allies
item.description: US National Defense Strategy says Chinese threat is not a priority as Washington pivots to the Western Hemisphere.

item.title: Trump says ‘US armada’ moving towards Iran as tensions escalate
item.description: Trump ordered an aircraft carrier and a guided-missile strike group to the Middle East as tensions soar with Iran.

item.title: US military moves Navy, Air Force assets to the Middle East: What to know
item.description: Trump says US 'armada' is heading towards the Gulf, raising fears of a military escalation in the region.

item.title: Wave of Israeli attacks kills two in Lebanon in latest ceasefire violation
item.description: Deadly Israeli air strikes target areas across south Lebanon and the Bekaa Valley amid simmering regional tensions.

item.title: What al-Maliki’s return would mean for Iraq and the region
item.description: Nouri al-Maliki's third term as prime minister is likely to escalate sectarian politics in the country.

item.title: What’s behind the recent shift in US defence strategy?
item.description: Washington has revealed its new national defence strategy.

item.title: Why is Trump upending 80 years of US foreign policy?
item.description: Former Trump official Christian Whiton argues it is about time to press ‘reset’ on US relations with the world.

item.title: Winter storm leaves over a million customers without power across US
item.description: From Texas to New England, the monster storm brings hazardous conditions, prompting warnings to stay off roads.
